name: places/ChIJW4rvAThZwokRP9sfWleWME4
formattedAddress: 325 Hudson St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 325 Hudson St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I love Industrious!! I've worked here for almost 3 years, and it's the best office space I've ever worked in. The Industrious team, Casey and Analysa, are the very best and greet me with a warm smile everyday and show a genuine interest in my work and my family. The offices are beautiful, and as my company has grown we've been able to move to progressively larger offices over time. Of course, my favorite part is the free breakfast (and snacks)!

text.text: I love Industrious!! I've worked here for almost 3 years, and it's the best office space I've ever worked in. The Industrious team, Casey and Analysa, are the very best and greet me with a warm smile everyday and show a genuine interest in my work and my family. The offices are beautiful, and as my company has grown we've been able to move to progressively larger offices over time. Of course, my favorite part is the free breakfast (and snacks)!

originalText.text: Wow, what to say? The space is clean, chic, and always good vibes. The companies that surround us are motivated, innovative and friendly.  And best of all are the two space managers Taylor and Madeline! They have built a fun and productive environment, always have the best snacks and happy hours, and plan other fun space events! Highly would recommend to anyone looking for co working space in the greater Manhattan area.

text.text: Wow, what to say? The space is clean, chic, and always good vibes. The companies that surround us are motivated, innovative and friendly.  And best of all are the two space managers Taylor and Madeline! They have built a fun and productive environment, always have the best snacks and happy hours, and plan other fun space events! Highly would recommend to anyone looking for co working space in the greater Manhattan area.

originalText.text: As a member / resident of Industrious SoHo West, I cannot say enough great things about the space and it's many fantastic amenities. You get the best of both worlds in terms of a beautiful, private office space, with the experience of a coworking office including delicious food and snacks, programming, and general office amenities such as conference rooms, mail room, printing, and more. The whole space is luxurious yet approachable, and I am so proud to show it off to my many office visitors! On top of it all, office managers Madeline and Taylor are kind, helpful, and truly make everyone feel at home and taken care of!

text.text: As a member / resident of Industrious SoHo West, I cannot say enough great things about the space and it's many fantastic amenities. You get the best of both worlds in terms of a beautiful, private office space, with the experience of a coworking office including delicious food and snacks, programming, and general office amenities such as conference rooms, mail room, printing, and more. The whole space is luxurious yet approachable, and I am so proud to show it off to my many office visitors! On top of it all, office managers Madeline and Taylor are kind, helpful, and truly make everyone feel at home and taken care of!

originalText.text: My team moved into Industrious SoHo West the day it opened. Even with some of the minor blips one would expect with day 1 of opening the doors the team runs a very smooth machine. Madeline and Taylor are amazing and completely committed to making sure everyone has a positive experience. The space is modern and professional-looking with a lot of light and spaces to gather. The location is also convenient to almost everywhere in Manhattan. My only complaint is that we don't have breakfast tacos everyday - Taylor? ;)

originalText.text:
My company moved into industrious a month ago. We love it so far. Easy location to get to, close to the subway.

The space itself is beautiful, all new and well lit. The kitchen is always clean and has plenty of snacks. The service is really great: Madeline and Taylor, the office managers, are very thoughtful and friendly.
